projects.title: Kipher Cryptography Library
projects.description: A multi-module cryptographic library for JVM applications that simplifies data encryption using method abstraction, built with an automated CI/CD workflow for tests, builds, and publishing, streamlining the deployment process.

projects.title: ProCESO Outreach Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered web platform to streamline and centralize community outreach management, such as faculty delegation, activity reporting, archiving, automated e-certificate generation and distribution, and AI-driven feedback analysis.
